channel.title: Fish Vegetable Recipe on The Ulampinoy Project

item.title: Salmon & Spinach
item.description: If I ask my daughter, “What is your favorite fish?” In a heartbeat she will say, “Salmon!” Well, I cannot agree more. I like salmon too! Here is a healthy recipe for the weekend if you have had too much land animal meat this week. Ingredients Salmon Spinach Onions Garlic Olive oil Salt & pepper Hierbas provenzales (albahaca, or√©gano, romero, tomillo, ajedrea & mejorana) Procedure Rub the salmon slice with the herbs, salt and pepper.
